test-set.name: prod-ItemTypeDecl
test-set.description: Tests for item type declarations: 4.0 proposal

test-case.name: itemTypeDecl-001
test-case.description: local union type, used in instance of
test-case.test: declare type local:int-or-string as (xs:integer | xs:string); 2 instance of local:int-or-string

test-case.name: itemTypeDecl-002
test-case.description: local union type, used in instance of with occurrence indicator
test-case.test: declare type local:int-or-string as (xs:integer | xs:string); (2, "fred") instance of local:int-or-string*

test-case.name: itemTypeDecl-003
test-case.description: local union type, used in cast as. Issue 163
test-case.test: declare type local:int-or-string as (xs:integer | xs:string); "fred" cast as local:int-or-string

test-case.name: itemTypeDecl-004
test-case.description: local union type, used in cast as. Issue 163
test-case.test: declare type local:int-or-string as (xs:integer | xs:string); "30" cast as local:int-or-string

test-case.name: itemTypeDecl-005
test-case.description: local union type, used in treat as
test-case.test: declare type local:int-or-string as (xs:integer | xs:string); "fred" treat as local:int-or-string
